|c| Keyloada|the first earthquake you got hit by did 64% why would it suddenly do less damage?
|c| Map217|rolls
|c| Waltbo|using calculator
|c| Waltbo|dummy
|c|☆NotADragonTrainer|i'm saying
|c|☆NotADragonTrainer|i realize
|c|☆NotADragonTrainer|i had the wrong item on chi yu
|c|☆NotADragonTrainer|this is unfortunate for me.
|c| LiquidPlazmid77|Knew it
|c| Map217|first quake could have been a low roll or the second one could have been a high
|c| Map217|either or
|c| Keyloada|You're right, but even with rolls, hatty was at like 50% to the 64% they took the first time
|c| Map217|it was at 63
|c|☆NotADragonTrainer|Well.
|c|☆NotADragonTrainer|Such is life, I suppose.
|c| Map217|so it was a pretty close roll
|c| Map217|or the first quake was a low roll and it wasnt a roll at all
